| HistoryText             = After reforming the [[Masters of Evil (Earth-616)|Masters of Evil]] with [[Erik Josten (Earth-616)|Atlas]], [[Norbert Ebersol (Earth-616)|Fixer]], [[Ulysses Klaw (Earth-616)|Klaw]], [[Karla Sofen (Earth-616)|Moonstone]], [[Todd Arliss (Earth-616)|Tiger Shark]], and the [[Wrecking Crew (Earth-616)|Wrecking Crew]], [[Helmut Zemo (Earth-616)|Baron Helmut Zemo]] decided to create an even bigger team of villains in order to expand the enterprise of a [[Steven Rogers (Earth-61311)|twisted version of Captain America]] that had replaced the [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|real one]] due to the [[Johann Shmidt (Clone) (Earth-616)|Red Skull]]'s machinations using the sentient [[Cosmic Cube]] named [[Kobik (Earth-616)|Kobik]].{{r|Captain America: Steve Rogers Vol 1 13}}

As part of Captain America's plan to take over the United States, Baron Zemo had the Army of Evil attack Midtown [[Manhattan]] in the name of the countless of villains whose lives had been tampered with by [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] in the super-prison of [[Pleasant Hill]]. The real purpose of the attack was to lure out as many of America's superheroes as possible. Baron Zemo subsequently had the Army of Evil teleport away, and used the [[Darkhold]] to boost the powers of [[Marcus Daniels (Earth-616)|Blackout]] to trap half of the island in a dome of [[:Glossary:Darkforce|Darkforce]], isolating heroes on the scene from the rest of the nation.{{r|Secret Empire Vol 1 0}} The Army of Evil later fought off any remaining heroes in [[Washington, D.C.]] as Hydra moved toward the capital to secure its takeover of the country.{{r|Free Comic Book Day Vol 2017 Secret Empire}}

After Hydra took over the United States,{{r|Secret Empire Vol 1 1}} Hydra Supreme Steve Rogers decided to place the Army of Evil in stasis, being wary of what they could do if they remained free.{{r|Secret Empire Vol 1 9}} Only a few remained free, namely [[Calvin Zabo (Earth-616)|Mister Hyde]],{{r|Secret Warriors Vol 2 2}} [[Sergei Kravinoff (Earth-616)|Kraven the Hunter]],{{r|Secret Empire: Brave New World Vol 1 3}} and Blackout{{r|Deadpool Vol 6 34}} (who would later be killed by [[Maria Hill (Earth-616)|Maria Hill]] in order to release the Darkforce dome over Manhattan).{{r|Secret Empire Vol 1 8}} When a contingent of American superheroes who opposed Hydra's regime known as the [[Underground (Secret Empire) (Earth-616)|Underground]] launched a massive offensive against Hydra in Washington DC, Baron Zemo was ordered to awaken the Army of Evil. He was stopped by [[T'Challa (Earth-616)|Black Panther]] and [[James Buchanan Barnes (Earth-616)|Winter Soldier]] before he could accomplish his task.{{r|Secret Empire Vol 1 9}} When the Hydra regime ended,{{r|Secret Empire Vol 1 10}} the Army of Evil was likely released from stasis and were either forced to disband or were arrested by the authorities.
